column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So when we left I brought it to the attention of the ladies at the front desk
column2: who apologized profusely. They then fetched the on-duty manager
column5: taller fellow that seemed supremely uninterested in the fact that I'd just told him his Parlor was playing X-rated music while folks dined. He didn't seemed to care. In fact
column6: he hinted it was actually my own fault for not knowing that their Parlor was a 'true speakeasy that plays contemporary
